channel.title: Halo 3 server going through problems?
channel.description: I have been playing today and it's been shit, i have noticed i've been dying a lot faster than normal and i played a team battle and the game was won at score 25. anybody know of anything?

item.title: Halo 3 server going through problems?
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

K, Cryme time, Whats you’re GT. For I can shut you up. ;). Oh, By the way, my highest rank is in lone wolves. So, post you’re GT or add me. I Divine Fury I.

I’ll make sure to post the post game after the smack down ;).

http://www.bungie.net/Stats/Halo3/Default.aspx?player=I+Divine+Fury+I

Just to show you what you’re facing.

Look at all my stats.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3 server going through problems?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

There was actually a virus planted into the halo 3 xbox live match making system… Thats why it’s been slow since chrismas.

Matchmaking being so slow is the only reason I don’t really play it now.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3 server going through problems?
item.dc:creator: @diamond1 diamond™
item.description:
@diamond1 wrote:

[quote=“fluffymuff1n, post:16, topic:179175”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=240300.msg2040111#msg2040111 date=1202530499]

It’s funny how i got rep++ when i was trying to get myself warned again. and seriously i will probably kick atleast half your asses if i’m having a good day.

I’ll beg a differ. Bad day or good day, pretty sure you just suck overall, Or, it could be the servers.

wanna 1v1?

lol commanders. i beat bragadiers.
actually yeah i do so i can teach you how to get your ass beat. i’ve won in lonewolf’s against commanders when i was still in 1st ranks.

How many lies can one bullshit about?
[/quote]
why did you quote him and post? dumb shit…

and btw i am also prty gd; 247 EXP.[/quote]

item.title: Halo 3 server going through problems?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Team death match depends on the map for the score limit doesn’t it? Or you disconnected from xbox live, which makes the game end on whatever score it is.

If you’re getting owned, it’s probably because you’ve ranked up to a better level, and started to get MLG nerds.

Read full topic
